Name: Financial Tax Credits IPH

Description.String: Type a Federal ITC amount ($) for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a Federal ITC percentage for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a Federal ITC maximum amount ($) for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a State ITC amount ($) for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a State ITC percentage for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a State ITC maximum amount ($) for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a Federal PTC amount ($/MMBtu) for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.
Type a State PTC amount ($/MMBtu) for each year. Use nominal dollars. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to these values.

itc_fed_amount_deprbas_fed.Label: Federal ITC reduces federal depreciation basis

itc_fed_amount_deprbas_sta.Label: Federal ITC reduces state depreciation basis

itc_fed_percent_deprbas_fed.Label: Federal ITC by percent reduces federal depreciation basis

itc_fed_percent_deprbas_sta.Label: Federal ITC by percent reduces state depreciation basis

itc_sta_amount_deprbas_fed.Label: State ITC reduces federal depreciation basis

itc_sta_amount_deprbas_sta.Label: State ITC reduces state depreciation basis

itc_sta_percent_deprbas_fed.Label: State ITC by percent reduces federal depreciation baiss

itc_sta_percent_deprbas_sta.Label: State ITC by percent reduces state depreciation basis

Callbacks: else { // all other dispatch options have grid charge option
message = 'Inflation does not apply to the PTC amount. In Schedule mode, use nominal (current) dollar values. See Help for details.';

message = 'Grid charging is enabled on the Battery Dispatch page. The PTC is calculated from Electricity to Grid, which may include electricity discharged by the battery to the grid that was originally stored from the grid.';
